description: Observability and telemetry collection for applications communicating via Remote Procedure Calls, enabling insight into request latency, errors, and end-to-end service interactions.

dimensions.description: Captures latency, request counts, and error rates for Thrift services. Adoption is moderate; documentation is good, but usage lags behind gRPC.
Enables distributed tracing and metrics for Dubbo-based services, popular in certain regions. Standardization improving, but community smaller than gRPC.
Traces RSocket streams and interactions, capturing latency and backpressure signals. Promising for reactive systems, but less widespread than HTTP/gRPC.
